did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Correspondence and Subject Files of the Secretary of the Commonwealth,

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Correspondence and Subject Files of the Secretary of the Commonwealth, 2014-2022, Accession 53505. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 53505 was transferred by the Office of the Secretary of the Commonwealth, Jan 21, 2022.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Topics include but are not limited to appointments, electronic notarization, legislation, Millennial Civic Engagement Task Force, Commonwealth Commission on Diversity, Equity and Inclusion, and restoration of rights.
Records may include agendas, correspondence, executive order, legislation, meeting records, notes, oaths of office, talking points, reports.

unittitle.emph: Correspondence and Subject Files of the Secretary of the Commonwealth - McAuliffe Administration,
Series I: Secretary of the Commonwealth, 2014-2018.

scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence and subject files of Secretary of the Commonwealth Levar Stoney (2014-2016) and Secretary of the Commonwealth Kelly Thomasson (2016-2018) during the administration of Governor Terrence McAuliffe. Includes files for appointments, electronic notarization, executive orders, legislation, Millennial Civic Engagement Task Force, Commonwealth Commission on Diversity, Equity and Inclusion, and restoration of rights, among others. Appointment files consist mainly of recommendation letters for appointment or reappointment to college and university boards of visitors. Commonwealth Commission on Diversity, Equity and Inclusion include correspondence, meeting records, oaths of office for commission members, planning documentation, and talking points. Legislative files include legislation, legislative action summaries, and planning documentation. Millennial Civic Engagement Task Force records include correspondence, forum and planning documentation, meeting records, and reports. Restoration of rights files include correspondence, announcement records related to Gov. McAuliffe's Restoration of Rights Order, 2016; as well as policy change and research documentation.

unittitle.emph: Series I: Secretary of the Commonwealth, 2016-2017.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence and subject files of Deputy Secretary Traci DeShazor, 2016-2017. Records of the Commonwealth Commission on Diversity, Equity and Inclusion include a draft interim report, 2017 Dec; signed oaths of office for commission members, 2017 Oct; and a memo related to the anniversary of the tragic events in Charlottesville, undated. Millenial Civic Engagement Task Force records include a 2017 Report on the State of Millennial Civic Engagement in the Commonwealth; Proposal to Re-establish a Campus Compact, 2017; proposals, meeting records, and signed oaths of office for task force members, 2017 July.

did.unittitle: Commonwealth Commission on Diversity, Equity and Inclusion, 2016-2017.

unittitle.emph: Correspondence and Subject Files of the Secretary of the Commonwealth - Northam Administration,
Series I: Secretary of the Commonwealth Kelly Thomasson, 2018-2022.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence and subject files of Secretary of the Commonwealth Kelly Thomasson include correspondence, Topics include appointments
Appointment files consists of letters of recommendation for appointment or reappointment to various boards and commissions, the majority of which are for college and university boards of visitors.
